name: I Forgot the Bus Again
description:
Created for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1.

Distracted by his games, our protagonist finds himself without any means of transportation. It looks like he is going to need to run all the way, but he must avoid all the hazards that lie in his way.

Controls:

A and D to move left and right respectively and space to jump.

Quit the game by pressing the escape key.

Note:

Though there is a WebGL build of this project, my attempts to improve performance were unsuccessful and will run very poorly. Please consider downloading the windows version if possible.

Have fun
